languages.text: Проходят часы, прежде чем свирепый буран утихает. Вокс-связь с кораблем восстанавливается, и обеспокоенные офицеры мостика докладывают о направленном к Лорд-капитану подкреплении, что уже высадилось на планету и ведет поиски.

Hours pass before the ferocious storm subsides. Communication with the ship is restored, and anxious bridge officers report that reinforcements from the ship have already landed on the planet and are now searching for the Lord Captain.
languages.original_text: Проходят часы, прежде чем свирепый буран утихает. Вокс-связь с кораблем восстанавливается, и обеспокоенные офицеры мостика докладывают о направленном к Лорд-капитану подкреплении, что уже высадилось на планету и ведет поиски.

traits.locale_text: Hours pass before the ferocious storm subsides. Communication with the ship is restored, and anxious bridge officers report that reinforcements from the ship have already landed on the planet and are now searching for the Lord Captain.

Hours pass before the ferocious storm subsides. Communication with the ship is restored, and anxious bridge officers report that reinforcements from the ship have already landed on the planet and are now searching for the Lord Captain.

languages.text: 几个小时之后，猛烈的暴风雪消散了，探险队与飞船恢复了联系。音阵装置中传来了舰桥军官焦急的声音，声称飞船上的增援部队已经在行星表面登陆，正在全力搜寻舰长大人的位置。
languages.original_text: Hours pass before the ferocious storm subsides. Communication with the ship is restored, and anxious bridge officers report that reinforcements from the ship have already landed on the planet and are now searching for the Lord Captain.

traits.locale_text: 几个小时之后，猛烈的暴风雪消散了，探险队与飞船恢复了联系。音阵装置中传来了舰桥军官焦急的声音，声称飞船上的增援部队已经在行星表面登陆，正在全力搜寻舰长大人的位置。

languages.text: 猛烈な嵐が弱まるまでに数時間が経過する。シップとの通信は回復し、心配していた艦橋の将校より、シップから派遣された増援がすでにこの星に着陸してロード・キャプテンを捜索中であるという報告が入る。
languages.original_text: Hours pass before the ferocious storm subsides. Communication with the ship is restored, and anxious bridge officers report that reinforcements from the ship have already landed on the planet and are now searching for the Lord Captain.

traits.locale_text: 猛烈な嵐が弱まるまでに数時間が経過する。シップとの通信は回復し、心配していた艦橋の将校より、シップから派遣された増援がすでにこの星に着陸してロード・キャプテンを捜索中であるという報告が入る。

languages.text: La feroz tormenta tarda horas en amainar. Se restablece la comunicación con la nave y los oficiales del puente, nerviosos, informan de que los refuerzos de la nave ya han aterrizado en el planeta y se encuentran buscando {mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán.
languages.original_text: Hours pass before the ferocious storm subsides. Communication with the ship is restored, and anxious bridge officers report that reinforcements from the ship have already landed on the planet and are now searching for the Lord Captain.

traits.locale_text: La feroz tormenta tarda horas en amainar. Se restablece la comunicación con la nave y los oficiales del puente, nerviosos, informan de que los refuerzos de la nave ya han aterrizado en el planeta y se encuentran buscando {mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán.

languages.text: Au bout de plusieurs heures, la violente tempête finit par s'apaiser. Les communications sont rétablies avec le vaisseau et ses officiers rongés par l'inquiétude, qui signalent que des renforts ont été envoyés sur la planète afin de retrouver {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}.
languages.original_text: Hours pass before the ferocious storm subsides. Communication with the ship is restored, and anxious bridge officers report that reinforcements from the ship have already landed on the planet and are now searching for the Lord Captain.

traits.locale_text: Au bout de plusieurs heures, la violente tempête finit par s'apaiser. Les communications sont rétablies avec le vaisseau et ses officiers rongés par l'inquiétude, qui signalent que des renforts ont été envoyés sur la planète afin de retrouver {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}.

languages.text: Stunden vergehen, bevor der tobende Sturm nachlässt. Die Kommunikation mit dem Schiff wird wiederhergestellt, und nervöse Offiziere melden von der Brücke, dass Verstärkung vom Schiff bereits auf dem Planeten gelandet sei und nun nach dem Lord Captain suche.
languages.original_text: Hours pass before the ferocious storm subsides. Communication with the ship is restored, and anxious bridge officers report that reinforcements from the ship have already landed on the planet and are now searching for the Lord Captain.

traits.locale_text: Stunden vergehen, bevor der tobende Sturm nachlässt. Die Kommunikation mit dem Schiff wird wiederhergestellt, und nervöse Offiziere melden von der Brücke, dass Verstärkung vom Schiff bereits auf dem Planeten gelandet sei und nun nach dem Lord Captain suche.

languages.text: Şiddetli fırtına hafifleyene kadar saatler geçiyor. Gemiyle iletişim yeniden sağlanıyor. Endişeli köprü subayları, destek ekiplerinin gezegene iniş yaptığını ve Lord Kaptan'ı aradıklarını bildiriyor.
languages.original_text: Hours pass before the ferocious storm subsides. Communication with the ship is restored, and anxious bridge officers report that reinforcements from the ship have already landed on the planet and are now searching for the Lord Captain.

traits.locale_text: Şiddetli fırtına hafifleyene kadar saatler geçmişti. Gemiyle iletişim yeniden sağlandı. Endişeli köprü subayları, destek ekiplerinin gezegene iniş yaptığını ve Lord Kaptan'ı aradıklarını bildirdi.
